title: Mexico : housing prices 2018 to 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Price in thousand Mexican pesos for 6 number of Quarters.
The Price in thousand Mexican pesos is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q1 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q3 2018.
The difference of Price in thousand Mexican pesos between the highest and lowest Quarter is 270.26.
